message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its true value.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I value your offer, the lowest I can go is $13,000. This is already a very competitive price for what the product offers.
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $13,000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. How about we split the difference at $12,000?  This would be a fair price for both of us.
